DOC.detailed_description: The Prolapse Registry observational study patient implant AMS device surgical repair female pelvic prolapse . The registry follow patient post-operatively 2 year collect demographic , clinical , surgical , safety , patient outcomes data . The registry web-based system surgeon enter patient information regard prolapse surgery . All information enter de-identified ( name , date birth , date surgery , etc ) .
